extendedInfo.description: If you are a Waze user, you know that setting up the device for Waze can be a hassle.Enable the GPS, and the bluetooth, maybe set the brightness to maximum.NO MORE!Waze Tools was created to make all this hassle dissapear!With Waze Tools, you can set your preferences as YOU need them and choose what you need when you are using Waze.The application will detect your Waze when it starts, and set your device as you need it!Forget about all other apps that drain your battery. Waze tools will keep it presence at minimum for your convenience.** IMPORTANT **- Make sure to enable Waze tools after the installation, and configure your favorite preferences- Enabling GPS depends on your operating system version. If Waze tools cannot enable or disable your GPS, you will be presented with a convenient screen to do it manually If you find any issues, crashes, etc, email me and I will resolve it as soon as possible.Suggestions and bugs: budipower.dev@gmail.com    Feature List ==============- Toggle WIFI- Toggle Data- Toggle GPS- Toggle Bluetooth- Toggle auto screen rotation- Set volume level to maximum- Set brightness level to maximum- Night mode- Show notification that opens the dialer from the notification barYes, this app has ads, but not the kind you are used to.This app will add a sponsored caller id service to your device. This will add a few permission requests to provide the service. By using it we get a few cents and it will help us a lot to keep developing more apps. If you donât, you can delete the app or disable the feature in the app settings and no harm is done. If you don't like it and do not want to support the developer with this minimal effort, feel free to check out the alternatives. Thank you.*** This application is NOT part of Waze. Any issues you have with Waze you should address to their developers directly.

reviews.title: Nice App
reviews.comment: Does what the description says. The only issue found is that after closing Waze, it goes to location settings, instead of closing silently. It could be because I\'m using JB 4.3.x. Really don\'t know.
reviews.author: Mauricio Lopez

reviews.title: Same problem on nexus 4
reviews.comment: Cant toggle gps.

reviews.title: Waze works better without it.
reviews.comment: Waze takes a lot longer to find me on GPS when I use this app. Takes forever to recalculate routes if I deviate. Uninstalled!

reviews.title: Nice add on
reviews.comment: It\'s a big help to have these settings adjusted if you aren\'t using a car dock or car mode app.
reviews.author: Mark Davitt

reviews.title: Good idea
reviews.comment: Unfortunately, it doesn\'t able to turn on/off my GPS (Samsung Note). Sometimes after Waze closed it don\'t off BT also. With the brightness it has some mess - I would like if the app will return all configuration for previous state. But I believe that with time it can be very good application.
reviews.author: Michael Neifeld

reviews.title: Getting better
reviews.comment: It is a work in progress.  It is helpful to have the additional functionality when Starting Waze.  Keep improving!  It\'s getting there.  How about a suggestion box in addition to the bug reporting?
reviews.author: Gene Stair

reviews.title: It\'s not that good yet.
reviews.comment: I have been tring to use it afew times ,some of the times worked ok but some other times it didn\'t as it couldn\'t find GPS signal but it worked well with google maps. Please improve this and I\'ll give 5 stars.
